name: Correlation Processor
description: Computes the correlation matrix of a list of fields containing numerical values.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The correlation matrix over these fields will be computed and returned under result as a single datum.

parameters.name: p_values
parameters.description: If this field is filled out, the P-values will be added to the result of the datapacket. If not, P-values will not be added.
